events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I need to request a refund because the size is completely wrong and doesn't fit at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to product sizing issue. Categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning the case to refund specialist agent Jane Carter for further handling and resolution of the refund request.
Hello, this is Jane from customer support. I understand you need a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or worn, so we can proceed with our return policy?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new and I haven't worn it outside. I just tried it on and found it too small.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
The return label has been emailed to the customer. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to check if you have returned the jacket and if you need any further assistance regarding your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday. Thank you for checking in, and I look forward to the refund confirmation.
We have processed your refund today. The amount should appear back on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further support.
